name: Chimera (itch) (MichaelFergie)
description:
In a city lost to a fight between superheroes, the Chimera must take back the powers. Evera destined to prove herself that she is the best takes on the ultimate mission. Run, jump, roll and fly through each level as you take back the fallen powers. Encounter enemies of the city’s past and present while slowly unraveling the truth of the war between heroes. Fight with electricity and earth to save the city and fulfill your mission in this action packed platform shooter. The powers are in your hands.

(This is a working beta. The game will be officially finished and released at a later date)
